title: R R International Translation
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: r_r_international_translation
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with R R International Translation. The average
  contract duration was 1.03 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $144.5K. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.6M.
lookup_name: 'R R INTERNATIONAL TRANSLATION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '216'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '45'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '21%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '85%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.24'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.7M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.03'
s421_mean_contract_value: '144.5K'
s425_max_duration: '4'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.6M'
---
